result.execSummary:
Stanley J Wade was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Stanley J Wade was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stanley J Wade

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Stanley J Wade not in court, defendant in custody.  Michael R Staskunas appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Status Conference. Defendant has been extradited to the State of Maryland. Court ordered case administratively closed.

Defendant Stanley J Wade in court with attorney Amanda Poznanski.  Defendant Stanley J Wade in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Status Conference. Defendant served with governors warrant on this day by Deputy Ndina. The defendant does not have any pending cases and will transported to the State of Maryland. Remand continues. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Amanda Poznanski in court, defendant Stanley J Wade not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Status Conference as to extradition. State request an extension for the governors warrant. Defense objects and request case closed. Court GRANTED states request and adjourned the matter, Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Stanley J Wade not in court, defendant in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Status Conference. Defendant contested extradition. Court adjourned case, Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent as a friend of the court, defendant Stanley J Wade not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Bail Hearing. Defendant needs counsel on this matter. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Status conference scheduled for February 14, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Stanley J Wade not in court, defendant in custody.  Patrick J Leigl appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appear via zoom.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM.   Case set for Bail/bond hearing.  Defense counsel has not appeared in court. Court set case over. Case adjourned, branch 38.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for January 24, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Stanley J Wade in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Stanley J Wade in custody.  Kaitlyn Lewis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Stanley J Wade appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38. Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Maryland.
Defendant contested extradition.  Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for January 21, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
